ValidationRule.description:
When the Status field is moved to Solved and Resolution is blank it makes the user pick a value for Resolution.
deactivating rule per - INC2922124
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name ,'System Admin')) && RecordTypeId = '01270000000UKtw' && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Solved') && ISPICKVAL( Resolution__c ,'')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot Solve a Case without picking a value in the Resolution field.
